CustomField.formula: IF( FIND("-", clariti__LedgerAccountNumber__c , FIND("-", clariti__LedgerAccountNumber__c , FIND("-", clariti__LedgerAccountNumber__c , FIND("-", clariti__LedgerAccountNumber__c ) + 1) + 1) + 1) > 0, MID( clariti__LedgerAccountNumber__c , FIND("-", clariti__LedgerAccountNumber__c , FIND("-", clariti__LedgerAccountNumber__c , FIND("-", clariti__LedgerAccountNumber__c , FIND("-", clariti__LedgerAccountNumber__c ) + 1) + 1) + 1) + 1, LEN(clariti__LedgerAccountNumber__c ) - FIND("-", clariti__LedgerAccountNumber__c , FIND("-", clariti__LedgerAccountNumber__c , FIND("-", clariti__LedgerAccountNumber__c , FIND("-", clariti__LedgerAccountNumber__c ) + 1) + 1) + 1) ), "NULL" )
CustomField.label: Function
